name: Pine Queen Dream
description: Pine Queen Dream by Piranha Seeds is a deep cannabis cut combining esoteric genetics with familiar favorites. Created from Pine Queen Haze (a cross of Pursuang Haze and Pine Queen) and Blue Dream, this sativa-dominant hybrid offers consumers a potent cerebral high alongside a rich pine aroma. The flavor is also woodsy and herbal, with notes of spice from the strain’s latent Haze genetics. Its uplifting mental effects can help improve mood and nullify stress while the physical effects remain potent and persistent with continued consumption. This strain was produced for and is grown by Green Acres Pharm.
descriptionPlain: Pine Queen Dream by Piranha Seeds is a deep cannabis cut combining esoteric genetics with familiar favorites. Created from Pine Queen Haze (a cross of Pursuang Haze and Pine Queen) and Blue Dream, this sativa-dominant hybrid offers consumers a potent cerebral high alongside a rich pine aroma. The flavor is also woodsy and herbal, with notes of spice from the strain’s latent Haze genetics. Its uplifting mental effects can help improve mood and nullify stress while the physical effects remain potent and persistent with continued consumption. This strain was produced for and is grown by Green Acres Pharm.

highlightedReviews.text:
This hybrid is one to keep an eye out for. The flower bt Green Acres Pharms is the perfect summer flower.  The uplift on the front end is fantastic. I'm usually an indican person my self. Yet I find this is a great daytime smoke . The balance of body and head high is great for a BBQ or anytime in the sun.

Budtender notes: 
Not too much dry mouth.

But a great pairing with your smoke would be a citrus IPA or a fresh hop beer.

The terp profiles in the flower and hops will complement one another.


sorry everyone for the lack of post... busy travling and budtending . 
Thanks for staying tuned!
great high, though my munchies hit me with a quickness
